subject: Colleges and Universities
Interscholastic Athletics
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Tim Pernetti, a former Rutgers football player and an executive at the CBS College Sports Network, will be introduced Thursday at a news conference as the athletic director at Rutgers, said a person with knowledge of the hiring who spoke on condition of anonymity. Pernetti still has to be formally approved by the university’s board of governors.
